interpolate[source]

interpolate(lex, removed_indices=[])

Method does interpolation based on the removed indices.
Substitutes the missing values based on the previous value in the array

load_dictionary[source]

load_dictionary(fname)

Given a fname, function loads a `pkl` dictionary
from the current directory

Args:

Returns:
    [dict]: Returns the loaded pkl file as a
